sn41.2:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharanti ambāṭakavane.
sn41.2:4.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.2:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.2:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn41.2:4.7: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn41.2:4.8: Atha kho therā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn41.2:5.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.2:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.2:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:5.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn41.2:5.6: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.2:5.7: Dutiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:5.9: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn41.2:5.10: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.2:5.11: Tatiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:5.13: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn41.2:5.14: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.2:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā isidatto tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.2:6.2: Atha kho āyasmā isidatto āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:6.3: “byākaromahaṃ, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino etaṃ pañhan”ti?
sn41.2:6.4: “Byākarohi tvaṃ, āvuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino etaṃ pañhan”ti.
sn41.2:6.7: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ, vuttaṃ bhagavatā’”ti?
sn41.2:6.12: Ettāvatā kho, gahapati, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti.
sn41.2:7.1: Atha kho citto gahapati āyasmato isidattassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā there bhikkhū paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn41.2:7.2: Atha kho therā bhikkhū bhuttāvino onītapattapāṇino uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn41.2:7.3: Atha kho āyasmā thero āyasmantaṃ isidattaṃ etadavoca:
sn41.2:7.4: “sādhu kho taṃ, āvuso isidatta, eso pañho paṭibhāsi, neso pañho maṃ paṭibhāsi.
sn41.2:7.5: Tenahāvuso isidatta, yadā aññathāpi evarūpo pañho āgaccheyya, taññevettha paṭibhāseyyā”ti.
